divs: Sighting DetailsFlying saucer hovering over my neighborhood. The were blueish purple lights cycling in a pattern from the center to the outer perimeter of the craft. Picture and video clip taken on wireless phone just black screen because it was after 10:00 pm. The flying saucer was large and silent.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around December 24th 2008
